name: form-scheduler
label: Form Scheduler
description: Queues project files for the submission pipeline
author: NACC

dry_run.description: Whether to do a dry run

submission_pipeline.description: Comma-deliminated list of gears representing a submission pipeline

accepted_modules.description: Comma-deliminated list of accepted modules. There will be one queue for each

prioritized_modules.description: Comma-deliminated list of modules to prioritize, which in turn are also prioritized relative to each other - must be a subset of accepted_modules

queue_tags.description: Comma-deliminated list of queue tags to filter project files for to determine which need to be queued

source_email.description: The source email; if not provided, will not send emails

apikey_path_prefix.description: The instance specific AWS parameter path prefix for apikey
